alternative_names.name: Groove Adventure Rave: Hikari to Yami no Daikessen 2
Groove Adventure Rave: Hikari to Yami no Daikessen 2

name: Rave Master: Special Attack Force!
summary: It's time for the Rave-olution! Battle it out as Haru Glory, Elie, Musica, and many other characters from the exciting new animated series. Wield powerful weapons and harness the skill of the Tension Gauge as you unleash explosive attack combos and incredible special moves to defeat your enemies.
